content: make a splash this summer with the kait cover up crochet pattern this stunning cover up is made of two lacey panels featuring a beautiful floral design which are then seamed together to create an oversized flowy cover up perfect for all shapes and sizes written in us terms materials 1410-2065 yards of lion brand oh baby organic in the color olive or similar weight 2 yarn crochet hook size e/4 3 5mm tapestry needle scissors and stitch markers xs/s/m- fits chest size 28-38 1410 yards/8 skeins l/xl/2x- fits chest size 40-50 1720 yards/10 skeins 3x/4x/5x- fits chest size 52-62 2065 yards/12 skeins this pattern is also available free on the meghan makes do blog 1 the kait is also available as a complete kit from lion brand yarn 1 https //www meghanmakesdo com/blog/the-kait-cover-up-free-crochet-pattern
